sentences.english: Well, you mentioned Kungfu, or boxing just now, I would say there are about 200 schools.

definition: a kind of traditional Chinese sword-play
lit. four ounces can move a thousand catties (idiom)/fig. to achieve much with little effort
Changquan - Northern Shaolin (北少林) - Longfist - Martial Art
flowery of fist with fancy footwork (idiom)/highly embellished and ineffectual/fancy but impractical skills/all show and no go/pugilistic wankery
to touch on sth and leave it there/to take care not to overdo sth
to make a show of being original or unconventional (idiom)
